content: / j / / j j s j j d s j j d j 5 5 4 / / / / 4 / j / / j j s j j d j v j s j j d j 3 x bobble bobble bobble bobble 3 2 bobobobo x / / 2 t / / j d j / / j d j j s j j d j d t s j s j j d j 1 1 left edge middle right edge chart 5 1x 383 bind off on wrong-side row 10 per instructions on page 3 j d j j s j v j j v j d j 9 9 8 / / / / / / 8 / j d j / / j d j j s j v j j v j d j 7 7 6 / / / / / 6 / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / j / / j j s j v j j v j d j 5 5 4 / / / / 4 / j / / j j s j v j j v j d j 3 x bobble bobble bobble bobble 3 2 bobobobo x / / 2 / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / j d j / / j d j j s j v j j v j d j 1 1 left edge middle right edge teresa rose © 2014 by dee o keefe wwwwrrrriiiitttttttteeeennnn iiiinnnnssssttttrrrruuuuccccttttiiiioooonnnnssss ppppaaaaggggeeee 9999 important before proceeding please read pages 2-4 for important information regarding the construction and how to begin and end the shawl cid 2 the pattern repeats are surrounded by brackets and highlighted in yellow for ease of reading work these repeats as many times as necessary until the specified number of stitches remains before the marker cid 2 the stitches within parentheses are to be worked in sequence the number of times noted cid 2 the 2 center spine stitches are printed in red cid 2 work all row of each chart in succession the number of times noted if you would like to adjust the size more or fewer repeats of chart 2 may be worked please refer to page 2 for more details cid 2 stitch counts are written between parentheses at the end of the last row of each chart and represent the total number of stitches you will have on your needles after working all row of that chart repeat cid 2 when purling to last marker slip the markers as you come to them chart 1 work 1 time for all sizes row
